info.name: Putnik Inn Belgrade
info.address: Palmira Toljatija 9, Novi Beograd, 11070 Belgrade, SerbiaAfter
info.description: Putnik Inn Belgrade has 84 standard room
info.longDescription: Putnik Inn Belgrade has 84 standard rooms, 19 suites and 1 room for people with special needs. The rooms are pleasant and meet the needs of the modern business man.
